website_summaries.verdict: This organic multivitamin and multimineral supplement is formulated for women over 40.
pros: Also includes D3, black cohosh, and turmeric for hormonal balance as well as iodine and selenium to help support the thyroid
May help with hair growth and health
cons: No iron, an important supplement for many women
Black cohosh can cause a hot, flushed face, so consult your doctor before using

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: So just noticed that NESTLE took over this brand! Beyond disappointed. No more purchases unless this is changed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Improved blood results taking these Vitamins
customer_reviews.text: These vitamins are excellent! I had blood work done by my doctor and four months later he said my blood tests had improved after beginning these vitamins! I have more energy and feel great! I am a smaller woman so I only take one vitamin verses two on the directions! I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Pellin

customer_reviews.title: These vitamins actually work, and not just the placebo effect.
customer_reviews.text: I have been experiencing symptoms of menopause and find I don't have the energy I used to. I have taken multiple different brands of vitamins over the years. I don't like to take medications and wanted to take as few pills as possible. Since starting the vitamins, I feel a little bit more like my old self. I'll be sticking with the Garden of Life over 40.
customer_reviews.author: Lenette L. Worrall

customer_reviews.title: My Vitamin for Life!
customer_reviews.text: First vitamin that has actually made a difference in my life! My hair has grown 3 inches since I started taking them and I have more energy!
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Gordy

customer_reviews.title: From the garden
customer_reviews.text: My favorite vitamin has been Solar's Earthsource, but the doses come in horse-pills and I've gagged too many times. So I've tried several other brands looking for a new favorite. I like Garden of Life very much. They have an excellent range and concentration of nutrients--and they come from natural sources. I have good energy when I take them regularly. I like that I need just two pills a day, which goes with my medication, morning and evening. I also like the slightly fruity taste on my tongue--pleasant to swallow. I plan to keep taking them.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Best vitamins on the planet.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely THE best vitamin brand on the market, no doubt about it. These are truly not like ANY other. They offer 100% food based ingredients and organic vegan, NOTHING artificial. Amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Smith

customer_reviews.title: I had an allergic reaction to these.
customer_reviews.text: Something in this product is causing me to have allergic reactions. I have tried to stop and start it several times and each time I feel so weird and then break out in hives. I have other allergies and there are so many ingredients in this product so who knows what caused it. I’ll have to stick with single ingredient supplements.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Very bad reaction
customer_reviews.text: Have been taking these for approximately a month and have been miserable with itchy hives which turned into bloody sores all over my entire body. They have gotten so bad that I have scars from some of the sores that lasted a couple weeks at a time, new ones pop up all over within hours of taking vitamins. Dr suspects these are the cause since no hives before and when I stop taking them for a couple days allergy/hives stop and sores begin to heal. Disgusted because i lost money on the larger bottle and now cant take them anymore. Used other products from GoL and never been so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Goldie

customer_reviews.title: Nice ingredients, seems to be good for me !
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy New Chapter, but, since they were purchased by Proctor & Gamble, they've changed formulations. I don't buy, recommend, or use Proctor & Gamble products.
customer_reviews.author: J L

customer_reviews.title: Allergic reaction
customer_reviews.text: I had a severe allergic reaction to the pills. I don’t know what’s in it in order for my body to have all over burning, red rash. Had to go to ER and take steroids for 5 days.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Drelich

customer_reviews.title: diassapointed of this product
customer_reviews.text: i bought 50$ pack for my mom as a gift. after using for a few days, she told me that she has hives on her face and her back and she also feels itchy all over her body. i couldn't be more disappointed,i spent weeks trying to find the best multivitamin for her and now she cant use them.
customer_reviews.author: jamal ansary

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: These are the best multi-vitamin I've ever taken. Since I started taking them, my energy level is is better. Just feel better all over now.
customer_reviews.author: Salvo

customer_reviews.title: Poor delivery
customer_reviews.text: I love the product. I am very disappointed in the delivery. It came out of the box with the bottom broken and shards of glass mixed in with the vitamins.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME! Saved my hair from falling out during pregnancy!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! I have taken these since I was pregnant with my first born and then while breastfeeding for over a year. There was a time where I ran out and stopped taking them for 2 months and then my hair started to fall out because breastfeeding was taking a toll on my body and sucking the vitamins out. I had ordered another bottle of these and started taking them again and then within a few weeks my hair stopped falling out again. It was such a relief! These make such a huge difference when trying to stay healthy and nourished while pregnancy and breastfeeding! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Sal

customer_reviews.title: Read ALL the ingredients!
customer_reviews.text: I should have read ingredients more closely - I have an allergy to seaweed/sea kelp. (Thank goodness I had Benadryl in the house.) Organic and natural isn’t always automatically the best thing to take if it has something you’re allergic to in it. My bad.
customer_reviews.author: L. Reese

customer_reviews.title: Can't Do Without Mykind Women's 40+
customer_reviews.text: I'm an active woman and when I hit menopause things changed a bit. And the hot flashes began. I took other products that had various herbs to help a woman during this time of life. The products actually made the hot flashes worse. After taking the Garden of Life Women's 40+ Vitamins, I'm good to go... Absolutely no more hot flashes! I'm thinking and feeling better. I take them every morning and try not to run out. The tablet is made to swallow, but I chew them to get the most out of them. Probably not necessary, but it works for me. Hope this helps. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Women's multivitamin
customer_reviews.text: Just received these vitamins so haven’t tried them yet so will comment on that at a later time. My complaint after opening them is that the bottle was filled with 2/3rds cotton and the last 1/3 was the actual vitamin. So basically 2/3 empty. Which is not worth $35. Will most likely not be ordering these again unless they work miracles for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Good multivitamin for vegans, bad packaging for the environment
customer_reviews.text: I was wavering between 3 and 4 stars. It’s so great to find a vegan multivitamin with no vitamin D from lanolin, but the pills are huge and you’re supposed to take 2 a day. They are very expensive too. But my biggest complaint is the wasteful, environmentally damaging packaging. The box is unnecessary, I see plenty of other vitamin bottles on the shelf without boxes. But even worse: the glass bottle (at least it’s recyclable) is only one half full of vitamins and one half full of cotton. I understand the need for *some* cotton, but this is ridiculous. And it’s not like some products that “settle,” so you don’t get a “full” pack; these pills are solid.
customer_reviews.author: DVC

customer_reviews.title: Best Organic Multivitamin
customer_reviews.text: I searched a long time to find a good organic multivitamin and I tried this once and have never bought another since. These are great. If you buy in quantity, the price is actually much less than non-organics on the shelves.
customer_reviews.author: Kendyle McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: My First and Only Choice of Multivitamin
customer_reviews.text: I found this brand first at Whole Foods before Amazon's connection with Whole Foods thereby purchasing on Amazon. I would recommend these multi-vitamins to all my friends.
customer_reviews.author: PA Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Love it. I get the iron separately since I ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I get the iron separately since I don't digest iron well. I take "Gentle Iron" from the Vitamin Shoppe. This doesn't constipate me at all.
customer_reviews.author: NM

customer_reviews.title: Organic, good-for-you, high quality vitamins at last!
customer_reviews.text: Appreciate the quality of Garden of Life vitamins, and that they are made of certified organic whole foods. So many brands on the market are mass-produced and of questionable quality and nutritional value. I feel like I am getting my money's worth, and my body is benefitting from them. I highly recommend this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I like this product easy on the stomach and easy to swallow
customer_reviews.author: Anjeanette Parks

customer_reviews.title: I am pleased with the organic ingredients but have to cut it up to swallow
customer_reviews.text: The ingredient composition is good (all natural ingredients) and the taste is what I expected based on the ingredients. However the size of pill is HUGE. I tried swallowing whole a few times but could never do it so, thankfully, I am able to cut them up into 4 pieces that I can then swallow separately.
customer_reviews.author: M. Sutton

customer_reviews.title: I recommend
customer_reviews.text: My mother was health conscious so I learned what goes in your body can help keep you healthy as opposed to processed and foods filled with chemicals. As far as the value, I rated it 5 because I have not compared price, however, like the two products in my picture. I take 1 of each of the tables in the morning with my breakfast.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: This vitamin was originally recommended to me by a local health food store
customer_reviews.text: This vitamin was originally recommended to me by a local health food store. I then found it on Amazon at a lower price. It has been for me, the best multi vitamin that I have ever found and I absolutely can tell a difference in the way I feel and my level of energy. I have recommended it to several of my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Reva

customer_reviews.title: Beware of huge price increase
customer_reviews.text: My wife has been using since June 2019 and she liked it overall and wanted to buy it again. But the price increase in 3.5 months was outrageous. I purchased 120 tablet for $35.97 and now it is $45.41 which is 26% increase!!! I could not believe my eyes when I saw it. Beware of sudden huge price increases. Who knows what you are going to be paying next month..
customer_reviews.author: ANIL ALPOGUNC

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the investment!
customer_reviews.text: These vitamins are well worth the money! I have SO much more energy from using them and I really notice a difference when I stop taking them. I’ve never once gotten nauseous from taking these vitamins, where as in the past some of the typical grocery store varieties tend to make you nauseous no matter what you do. These are high quality and really good for you! You can just tell when you take them. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Selena Craig

customer_reviews.title: It’s a complete multivitamin
customer_reviews.text: Love them I have been using this brand for over 15 years . They are a complete multivitamin
customer_reviews.author: Izzy Cuevas

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Have noticed my nails and hair are healthier as well as my skin

customer_reviews.title: Caused insomnia and anxiety for me
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if the black cohosh Ingredient caused me to have severe insomnia and anxiety while taking these. I am returning for the regular women’s multivitamin which I have taken for years.
customer_reviews.author: Yinzer mom

customer_reviews.title: Post menopausal and over 50
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking this multivitamin for about a year now and really like it. I like the Garden of Life products anyway and this vitamin provides what I need. It was cheaper for to order from amazon than buy at the love all health food store. They vitamins are a good size, but I have gotten used to them. There is not much of a taste. I take them every morning.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Bolton

customer_reviews.title: Do these work? I don't know, but I still take them.
customer_reviews.text: From the wife: I'd be lying if I said I can feel a difference when taking these, but that's not stopping me from still taking them. I believe in taking certain supplements and trust this brand, so I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DenaMan

customer_reviews.title: Healthy 2017!
customer_reviews.text: These Multivitamins have improved my health and my husbands. Our blood test results have improved because of them.
customer_reviews.author: Marcy

customer_reviews.title: Love the quality of these vitamins!
customer_reviews.text: As an Integrative Medicine for Mental Health specialist I appreciate the contents of this multivitamin and that it's made from organic whole foods. I take these myself and recommend them to my clients and in my book "Feed Your Calm: Anti-Anxiety Anti-Stress Diet and Supplement Tips for Stress Resilience."
customer_reviews.author: ann silvers

customer_reviews.title: made me feel sick
customer_reviews.text: I used these vitamins before and loved them. The last purchase, not so. They made me nauseated even when taken with food and literally made me sick on one occasion. It took me awhile to figure out why my stomach was getting upset. New formula? I won't buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: toni mccormick

customer_reviews.title: Over $30 savings with Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: At first, I was hesitant to purchase these vitamins because they are tablets and I thought they would be hard to digest, but I was wrong. Place a tablet in a glass of water and see that it instantly dissolves! These vitamins are the best you can buy, especially from Amazon because at health food stores you can expect to pay over $30 more. I feel re-energized when I take this product, it's a mood enhancer and gives me a boost each and every day. Thumbs up and a salute to the best vitamins on the market!
customer_reviews.author: Raquel

customer_reviews.title: I feel better when I take this vitamin...
customer_reviews.text: The price point is a bit high, so I did stop taking it for a while to see if I really felt any difference. Well, I have to say, I do feel better taking this vitamin daily then I do when I have not taken it. The price point is still too high, but I haven't found a vitamin to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: I must tell you, this is a big pill but I didn't mind taking it because I find that it helped me. I got less sick during the flu season. Yes I recommend

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The pills are a little big. I prefer the gel vitamins. They are still a good product and I do recommend them.

customer_reviews.title: Has great nutrients content but do not contain iron.
customer_reviews.text: They are big pills but I have not problem swallowing. Do not contain iron which I would prefer but has the rest of nutrients. Also has to drink 2 pills a day.

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be absorbed well
customer_reviews.text: I buy these because they were recommended because of organic sources for the vitamins and that they’re suppose to be well absorbed. I think they’re truly overpriced especially if you’re misfortunate enough to buy them at a health food store. But this is a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: MCS

customer_reviews.title: Worse constipation ever! Be aware
customer_reviews.text: I have much trouble with this product. I've had other supplements before but this one is the worst. I didn't want to believe that it was the pill that gave me problem going to the bathroom so I gave it a few tries with break in between. Result is the same. Constipation every time I take the pill. Too bad by the time I decide it's not worth trying anymore, the return window has already closed. Never buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: If you eat organic foods then why would you take ...
customer_reviews.text: If you eat organic foods then why would you take vitamins that are not organic? I feel as if there is more balance between my energy level and I am completely attending to my nutrient requirements.
customer_reviews.author: ETIQUETTE

customer_reviews.title: Love the brand.
customer_reviews.text: I love the ingredients however I wish the amount of the ingredients were increased especially biotin .They-include such low doses of each vitamin and mineral.That is the only reason I didn’t give this brand 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: pamela

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this and other GOL Products
customer_reviews.text: LOVE GOL products. I use the women's formula and also buy the men's for DH. It's made from organic foods only which is exactly what our bodies are meant to take in. No tummy upset, weird tastes or burping, etc. Have been using GOL for several years now and are very happy with them. We'll continue to use and definitely recommend them.

customer_reviews.title: Great woman vitamin
customer_reviews.text: Have used them for about 2 years, I can feel the difference taking them, rather than other women vitamins that do not seem to have the same quality.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars

Plus we chose it b/c of all the ingredients in it, specifically turmeric and magnesium; turmeric for tumor shrinking (I have a brain tumor), and magnesium to help alleviate the ringing in my head.

customer_reviews.title: This is truly real organic food
customer_reviews.text: Liked the fact that every ingredient is truly certified organic! Not another chemical junk.

customer_reviews.title: I love these vitamins!

No upset stomach ever and I am very sensitive about. I believe in eating the best quality organic foods I can, but I believe in this day and my age, 56, I want to make sure I am getting the vital vitamins and nutrients, etc.. I need. This product serves me well! Thank you Garden of Life!

customer_reviews.text: These are easy to swallow.. I can’t tell if anything is different but I guess that’s alright. I just turned 40 in November.. so I guess these are my kind of vitamins now.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Vitamins
customer_reviews.text: My nails have never grown so well until I started taking these vitamins. My energy level has also increased. These are well worth the cost. I no longer buy 10 different vitamins, I only take this one and am very pleased with the results.

THYROID SUPPORT SUPPLEMENT: mykind's vegan women's multivitamin includes vegan D3, Organic Black Cohosh, Tomato and Turmeric for hormone and breast support, and iodine and selenium for thyroid support
